```php
CREATE TABLE `restaurants` (
`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
`name` varchar(60) NOT NULL,
`address` varchar(90) NOT NULL,
`lat` float(9,6) NOT NULL,
`lng` float(9,6) NOT NULL,
PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM;

```
